original_text: And as Samuel was offering up the burnt offering, the Philistines drew near to battle against Israel: but the Lord thundered with a great thunder on that day upon the Philistines, and discomfited them; and they were smitten before Israel.
korean_text: 사무엘이 번제를 드릴 때에 블레셋 사람이 이스라엘과 싸우려고 가까이 오매 그 날에 여호와께서 블레셋 사람에게 큰 우레를 발하여 그들을 어지럽게 하시니 그들이 이스라엘 앞에 패한지라

sentences.original_text: And as Samuel was offering up the burnt offering,
the Philistines drew near to battle against Israel:
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 이스라엘과 싸우려고 가까이 왔으나,

sentences.original_text: but the Lord thundered with a great thunder on that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 여호와께서 큰 우레로 블레셋 사람들을 치시고

sentences.original_text: upon the Philistines, and discomfited them;
and they were smitten before Israel.
